global.schema:
type AtlasCoreState {
  name: String
  docNo: String
  parent: PHID!
  content: String
  masterStatus: Status!
  globalTags: [GlobalTag!]!
  references: [PHID!]!
  originalContextData: [PHID!]!
  provenance: URL
  notionId: String
}

enum Status {
  PLACEHOLDER
  PROVISIONAL
  APPROVED
  DEFERRED
  ARCHIVED
}

enum GlobalTag {
  SCOPE_ADVISOR_
  AVC_
  CAIS_
  ML___LOW_PRIORITY_
  EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_
  DAO_TOOLKIT_
  ML___DEFER_
  PURPOSE_SYSTEM_
  NEWCHAIN_
  ML___SUPPORT_DOCS_NEEDED_
  TWO_STAGE_BRIDGE_
  ECOSYSTEM_INTELLIGENCE_
  RECURSIVE_IMPROVEMENT_
  LEGACY_TERM___USE_APPROVED_
}

operations.name: UPDATE_CORE
operations.description: Updates an existing CoreDoc in the CoreDocState.
operations.schema:
input UpdateCoreInput {
  name: String
  content: String
  masterStatus: [Status!]!
  globalTags: [String]
  references: [PHID!]!
}
